SELECT request_no, user_id, request_title, request_content, regdate, request_kind FROM REQUEST ORDER BY request_no asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST ( request_no, user_id, request_title, request_content, request_kind ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(request_no)+1, 1)FROM REQUEST), #{user_id}, #{request_title}, #{request_content}, #{request_kind} )
